description:
Despite Whitebeard`s order to retreat, Ace is drawn back to the battlefield by the cruel taunts of a Marine adversary. Luffy watches in horror as his brother makes what could be his last stand!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Hi o mo Yaki Tsukusu Chikara: Akainu Hijou no Tsuigeki
Le pouvoir qui consume même le feu. La traque impitoyable d`Akainu
The Power That Can Burn Even Fire! Akainu`s Ruthless Pursuit!
Сила, сжигающая даже пламя! Безжалостное преследование Акаину
القوّة الّتي تستطيع حرق حتّى النّار! ملاحَقة أكاينو القاسية!
火をも焼き尽くす能力[ちから] 赤犬非情の追撃
